WorkItem.Description: The ability to set the inheritance to sealed is great, but when setting an element to sealed, it causes errors as child elements and attributes are declared virtual, and I can find no way to not declare them as virtual.

Comments.Message: Yes, This is a serious problem and I think it is easy to fix.
If this setting generates unfix-able code, then it is indeed a big issue. I'll take a look.

MS code generator adds "virtual" on its own. I see some notes about this online, but with no solution. There might be a reason for this, but I will keep it open for investigation. My latest check-in warns the user if they select this setting.
